channel.title: Iclarity Source Help
channel.description:
Hello all, I've decided to move on to a new source. I use to be a PI coder. I'm now using Iclarity. However the CLIENT.Java doesn't contain a place to place commands or Npcs for Shops. What I'm trying to figure out now is where to place my ::mypos command. And how to make it so when I click "talk" On my set Npcs the shop interface opens up. I tryed coding it into the CLIENT.Java which on Iclarity is called "Clienthandler.Java" however I get an error. So if someone could help me with one of the two problems It'd be greatly appreciated ~
- coding in new commands ( DONE )
- Giving an Npc a shop ( DONE )
- Sly Theft

item.title: Iclarity Source Help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“sly theft, post:5, topic:426732”]I found the commands on my own and thankyou very much ! I got it.

Edit: again thanks. Repp’d[/quote]

You’re welcome, if you need more help PM me. I’m more than willing to help someone using iClarity.

Read full topic

item.title: Iclarity Source Help
item.dc:creator: @sly_theft sly theft
item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

I found the commands on my own and thankyou very much ! I got it.

Edit: again thanks. Repp’d

Read full topic

item.title: Iclarity Source Help
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

iClarity, I haven’t heard anyone mention that base in ages.

For the Shops problem, just find your “openShop” method and add it under your “First Click” NPC packet. I don’t think I can explain it any more clearly than that. As for your Commands problem, I don’t understand what you’re wanting.

Read full topic

item.title: Iclarity Source Help

item.description:
@sly_theft wrote:

Hello all, I’ve decided to move on to a new source. I use to be a PI coder. I’m now using Iclarity. However the CLIENT.Java doesn’t contain a place to place commands or Npcs for Shops. What I’m trying to figure out now is where to place my ::mypos command. And how to make it so when I click “talk” On my set Npcs the shop interface opens up.
